Araj_TryToGoAway.synopsis: If players, after the first warning, try to go away, Araj will try to do a last warning before being hostile to players.
Araj_TryToGoAway.how_to_trigger: After receiving the potion, enter in the following trigger: S_LOW_BloodMerchant_HostileTrigger_593479e7-a5b1-45c6-8e15-5eb9b060d5b9

AD_PlayersTryExitHouse.synopsis: This AD will be shown if players try to go away from the house after Araj give them the special explosive potion. This is the first warning. After that warning, if players still try to go away a full dialog will be activated. So no ultimations will be necesary in this one, I think.
AD_PlayersTryExitHouse.how_to_trigger: After receive the potion, try to go away from S_Debug_Teleport_LOW_BloodMerchantsHouse_d03dde24-13d3-4fdd-a485-38b9a424f6c3

AD_ExplosionAraj.synopsis: If players give blood to the Blood Merchant at Act 2, they will see Araj in Lower city, saying this AD after her laboratory explodes.
AD_ExplosionAraj.how_to_trigger: Enter at S_LOW_BloodMerchant_FirstExplosion if some character has the flag MOO_InfernalVendor_State_SoldBlood_ae50cf43-a0ef-4ce6-bdb1-0ccf628b9a63

AD_PlayersDestroyPotion.synopsis: After getting the explosive potion:- If players destroy the potion, Araj will try to kill players.
AD_PlayersDestroyPotion.how_to_trigger: After receive the potion, destroy the potion inside S_Debug_Teleport_LOW_BloodMerchantsHouse_d03dde24-13d3-4fdd-a485-38b9a424f6c3

AD_PlayersDropPotionGround.synopsis: After getting the explosive potion:- If players drop the potion (not destroy it) to the ground, Araj will freak out a little bit.
AD_PlayersDropPotionGround.how_to_trigger: After receive the potion, drop the potion inside S_Debug_Teleport_LOW_BloodMerchantsHouse_d03dde24-13d3-4fdd-a485-38b9a424f6c3If a non tadpoled character try to drink the potion, the second node will be triggered.

Araj_MainDialog.synopsis: Dialog with Araj if you find her in Lower City
Araj_MainDialog.how_to_trigger: Click on S_MOO_InfernalVendor at Lower City

AD_BackupWarning.synopsis: If players go away from the Blood Merchant's Lair and the dialog never triggers, this AD will be triggered instead.
AD_BackupWarning.how_to_trigger: Entering S_LOW_BloodMerchant_StartDialogue_0f4ca0ce-5695-434b-9dbb-3e3b911c6bea after receiving the potion (or drink-it) without talking with Araj.

PAD_ExplosiveBlood.synopsis: Player AD after drinking the potion and your blood is explosive now.Can only be taken by tadpoled origins

AD_EvictedHouse.synopsis: If players interact both with LOW_BloodMerchant_Blackboard_000_4a542c37-0bca-447f-ac19-6843ac7f0101LOW_BloodMerchant_Blackboard_001_0859dcf8-4148-44cc-9360-a7352c6202c4, because Araj is not in the city, players will receive this.
AD_EvictedHouse.how_to_trigger: Click on LOW_BloodMerchant_Blackboard_000_4a542c37-0bca-447f-ac19-6843ac7f0101LOW_BloodMerchant_Blackboard_001_0859dcf8-4148-44cc-9360-a7352c6202c4 under the following conditions:- Araj (S_MOO_InfernalVendor) was killed in Act 2 OR- No player gives her blood

AD_ArajBehaviour.synopsis: ADs for Araj while she is on the Lower city, after giving her blood in Act 2.
AD_ArajBehaviour.how_to_trigger: Be near Araj in the different states she will have.

PAD_ExplosivePotion_NonTadpoled.synopsis: AD for Halsin and Jaheira if they drink the explosive potion. This AD will be only triggered AFTER drinking the potion, and the character will be poisoned after the explosion.
PAD_ExplosivePotion_NonTadpoled.how_to_trigger: Use S_LOW_BloodMerchant_ExplosivePotion with a non-tadpoled companion.

Araj_TryToGoAway_3.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_TryToGoAway_3.text: Ah-ah, my friend - Formula Gruna stays in the house, please! Go on - down the hatch.

Araj_TryToGoAway_5.speaker: Player
Araj_TryToGoAway_5.text: I've changed my mind. I don't want to take your potion.

Araj_TryToGoAway_4.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_TryToGoAway_4.text: But... my research. You have to take the potion. It will change everything. You'll see.

Araj_TryToGoAway_2.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_TryToGoAway_2.text: What a terrible pity. It would've been so much better to see the potion's effects on a living specimen. But in this case... I suppose dead will do.

AD_PlayersTryExitHouse_0.speaker: Araj Oblodra
AD_PlayersTryExitHouse_0.text: Excuse me - where do you think you're going? You'll need to take the potion here, please!
AD_PlayersTryExitHouse_0.context: NodeContext: Trying to be friendly but she's willing to kill the player if they don't comply.

AD_PlayersDestroyPotion_0.speaker: Araj Oblodra
AD_PlayersDestroyPotion_0.text: You couldn't have - not Formula Gruna. How... how could you?!
AD_PlayersDestroyPotion_0.context: NodeContext: About to attack the player

AD_PlayersDropPotionGround_0.speaker: Araj Oblodra
AD_PlayersDropPotionGround_0.text: BE CAREFUL! That's my only vial!

AD_PlayersDropPotionGround_1.speaker: Araj Oblodra
AD_PlayersDropPotionGround_1.text: And that's not for you. Only someone with a mind for illithids should even think to imbibe!
AD_PlayersDropPotionGround_1.context: InternalNodeContext: This node only will be triggered if players try to drink the potion with a non-tadpoled character. This will be triggered only once. Second time players try, fallback to combat.

Araj_MainDialog_9.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_9.text: FIRE IN THE - Oh! My silk, what are the chances  - it's you!
Araj_MainDialog_9.context:
NodeContext: Looking behind her shoulder after running out of an exploding building (though she's unscathed)

'My silk' as a stand in for 'my stars!' or 'my gods!'

Araj_MainDialog_167.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_167.text: And, ahh, the heart-stopping bloodsucker. Ever since our last liaison, I haven't been able to get you out of my mind...

Araj_MainDialog_52.speaker: Astarion
Araj_MainDialog_52.text: Nor have I. No matter how hard I try.

Araj_MainDialog_44.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_44.text: Forgive the fire and brimstone. Your blood is far more volatile than I'd anticipated.

Araj_MainDialog_178.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_178.text: Never better. Don't mind the mess. I've been doing fascinating things with your blood sample.

Araj_MainDialog_170.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_170.text: It's a breakthrough in the sanguine arts the likes of which the world has never seen. The Grand Matriarch will have no choice but to restore House Oblodra after I present her with my research.

Araj_MainDialog_146.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_146.text: But listen to me, rabbitting on about myself when I have you - the prize bleeder - on my very doorstep.

Araj_MainDialog_161.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_161.text: If you'd come inside, we could discuss something far more exciting than drow politics.

Araj_MainDialog_163.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_163.text: Not if you lead me first!
Araj_MainDialog_163.context: NodeContext: Awkward, A little giddy with excitement.

Araj_MainDialog_70.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_70.text: YES! That is - do follow me.
Araj_MainDialog_70.context: NodeContext: Trying to hide her excitement.

Araj_MainDialog_91.speaker: Player
Araj_MainDialog_91.text: Forget it. I saw how you made Astarion feel. I'm done with you.

Araj_MainDialog_113.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_113.text: How I made him feel? What I propose goes well beyond such frivolities. We are talking about alchemical breakthroughs based on the blood that runs through your veins, my friend!

Araj_MainDialog_39.speaker: Astarion
Araj_MainDialog_39.text: I appreciate the thought, but I'm not the person I was the last time we met. And if she can unlock the kind of power she's promising...

Araj_MainDialog_176.speaker: Astarion
Araj_MainDialog_176.text: Well, hearing her out won't kill us.

Araj_MainDialog_103.speaker: Player
Araj_MainDialog_103.text: You're right. Let's have a look.

Araj_MainDialog_47.speaker: Astarion
Araj_MainDialog_47.text: Just as long as she knows who belongs to who this time.

Araj_MainDialog_37.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_37.text: Now, now. I do think that's enough. When you see what I've been working on, bygones will all be bygones, I assure you.

Araj_MainDialog_73.speaker: Astarion
Araj_MainDialog_73.text: Just a look. And if we don't like what we see, we can always kill her later.

Araj_MainDialog_195.speaker: Astarion
Araj_MainDialog_195.text: Don't worry - if anything happens, I'll protect you.

Araj_MainDialog_51.speaker: Astarion
Araj_MainDialog_51.text: Well, death never stopped me before. I don't know why it should now.

Araj_MainDialog_69.speaker: Astarion
Araj_MainDialog_69.text: I appreciate the thought, truly, but if this is something you want to look into...

Araj_MainDialog_153.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_153.text: Boh! A pity. But you may change your mind - and if you do, don't hesitate to seek me out. I'll always be happy to see you.

Araj_MainDialog_2.speaker: Player
Araj_MainDialog_2.text: You might want to stop doing them before you kill yourself.

Araj_MainDialog_132.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_132.text: At the very edge of life and death is where one happens upon the true breakthroughs, my friend. That's how I discovered the delicious volatility of the blood sample you gave me.

Araj_MainDialog_122.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_122.text: My research will be the greatest breakthrough in the sanguine arts in a century. The Grand Matriarch will have no choice but to restore House Oblodra when I present my findings.

Araj_MainDialog_36.speaker: Player
Araj_MainDialog_36.text: I knew my blood was potent, but I didn't know it could do that.

Araj_MainDialog_72.speaker: Player
Araj_MainDialog_72.text: Oblodra - the blood merchant. I hadn't hoped to meet you again.

Araj_MainDialog_179.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_179.text: Lucky for us all, fate is more powerful than hope.

Araj_MainDialog_101.speaker: Player
Araj_MainDialog_101.text: You can really take some heat. I'm impressed.

Araj_MainDialog_142.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_142.text: No no, my friend - I'm the one impressed by you.

Araj_MainDialog_143.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_143.text: You see, it's your blood that caused the conflagration you just witnessed. Imagine!

Araj_MainDialog_7.speaker: Player
Araj_MainDialog_7.text: Astarion, we can leave if you don't want to be around her.

Araj_MainDialog_156.speaker: Astarion
Araj_MainDialog_156.text: Oh she doesn't bother me that much. If anything, I pity her.

Araj_MainDialog_180.speaker: Astarion
Araj_MainDialog_180.text: Don't worry, I can tolerate her.

Araj_MainDialog_168.speaker: Astarion
Araj_MainDialog_168.text: I would like to see her dead in a ditch, but I can tolerate this.

Araj_MainDialog_8.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_8.text: Such harsh words for an old friend!

Araj_MainDialog_131.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_131.text: But never mind all that. I have tremendously exciting news.

Araj_MainDialog_90.speaker: Astarion
Araj_MainDialog_90.text: Now you're happy to leave if I'm uncomfortable? How novel.

Araj_MainDialog_191.speaker: Astarion
Araj_MainDialog_191.text: I'm fine. Let's just get this over with.
Araj_MainDialog_191.context: NodeContext: Terse, annoyed at the player

Araj_MainDialog_141.speaker: Astarion
Araj_MainDialog_141.text: I'll be all right. Let's just get this over with.

Araj_MainDialog_62.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_62.text: Nervous to see me again, is he? How sweet.

Araj_MainDialog_56.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_56.text: But! We have quite a bit to discuss. What a wonder you came to my door just when you did.

Araj_MainDialog_64.speaker: Player
Araj_MainDialog_64.text: Astarion, we can leave if you don't want to be around her.

Araj_MainDialog_155.speaker: Player
Araj_MainDialog_155.text: You? You ruined my relationship with Astarion!

Araj_MainDialog_166.speaker: Astarion
Araj_MainDialog_166.text: No, give yourself some credit. You mostly ruined it all by yourself.

Araj_MainDialog_74.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_74.text: Oh, I can only offer my consolation. And say to you, pretty leech, that you're missing out. They have blood the likes of which I've never seen.

Araj_MainDialog_162.speaker: Player
Araj_MainDialog_162.text: I'm glad Astarion isn't here to hear of your vile experiments.

Araj_MainDialog_26.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_26.text: Oh, that perfect specimen is still travelling with you? And I missed him? What a terrible pity.

Araj_MainDialog_172.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_172.text: But! All is far from lost!

Araj_MainDialog_188.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_188.text: Forgive the mess. Your blood is far more volatile than I'd anticipated.

Araj_MainDialog_75.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_75.text: Ah, and the heart-stopping bloodsucker. I hope you've changed your mind. My neck is yours, any time.

Araj_MainDialog_109.speaker: Astarion
Araj_MainDialog_109.text: And I will keep refusing until the end of time. I'm done bowing to the whims of others.

Araj_MainDialog_13.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_13.text: I say, I'm positively giddy! Go on - drink the formula!

Araj_MainDialog_199.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_199.text: You... what?! Formula Gruna... the height of my research... you destroyed it?!

Araj_MainDialog_137.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_137.text: This won't do, darling. I'll have to take my work back in blood. Lots of it.
Araj_MainDialog_137.context: NodeContext: About to fight the player

Araj_MainDialog_14.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_14.text: FIRE IN THE - Oh! My silk, what are the chances  - it's you!
Araj_MainDialog_14.context:
NodeContext: Looking behind her shoulder after running out of an exploding building (though she's unscathed)

'My silk' as a stand in for 'my stars!' or 'my gods!'

Araj_MainDialog_27.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_27.text: Well, not you. But your travel companion. The one with the very special little friend stuck in their brain.

Araj_MainDialog_196.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_196.text: I'm dying to speak with them. You will send them my way, won't you? Ta!

Araj_MainDialog_23.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_23.text: Ah, my friend. If you've any more blood to spare, I'd be happy to exchange it for something of more use to you.

Araj_MainDialog_16.speaker: Player
Araj_MainDialog_16.text: Not today. Do you have anything else to trade?

Araj_MainDialog_24.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_24.text: Oh! My silk, what are the chances  - it's you!
Araj_MainDialog_24.context:
NodeContext: 

'My silk' as a stand in for 'my stars!' or 'my gods!'

Araj_MainDialog_65.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_65.text: Oh my - my heavens! You LIVED!

Araj_MainDialog_4.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_4.text: This is incredible. I'm seeing stars!

Araj_MainDialog_61.speaker: Player
Araj_MainDialog_61.text: You seem surprised. Had you expected me to die?

Araj_MainDialog_171.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_171.text: I'd hypothesised you wouldn't, my friend. And you've proven me absolutely correct.

Araj_MainDialog_78.speaker: Player
Araj_MainDialog_78.text: What did you do to me?

Araj_MainDialog_200.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_200.text: You, my friend, have become something... something I once thought beyond achievement.

Araj_MainDialog_147.speaker: Player
Araj_MainDialog_147.text: You tricked me. You'll pay for that.

Araj_MainDialog_96.speaker: Player
Araj_MainDialog_96.text: If that was all it took to kill me, I'd have died a long time ago.

Araj_MainDialog_154.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_154.text: My friend, I had no such intention. You don't know what this means to me - to my research!

Araj_MainDialog_20.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_20.text: You are the world's first detonative  exsanguinator. To put it simply: From this day on, your blood goes boom. Big boom! Ahaha! It's incredible!

Araj_MainDialog_149.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_149.text: All it needs is a spark.

Araj_MainDialog_104.speaker: Player
Araj_MainDialog_104.text: That seems quite powerful. Thank you.

Araj_MainDialog_95.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_95.text: I assure you, the pleasure is entirely, entirely mine. This research will skyrocket House Oblodra back to the forefront of drow scientific thought. Indeed, it could protect my line for generations.

Araj_MainDialog_11.speaker: Player
Araj_MainDialog_11.text: Is this going to kill me?

Araj_MainDialog_184.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_184.text: Certainly not. But it might do damage to anyone who makes you bleed without your express permission.

Araj_MainDialog_22.speaker: Astarion
Araj_MainDialog_22.text: Naturally, I always ask first. I'm civilised, unlike you.

Araj_MainDialog_68.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_68.text: There are other necks available for biting, of course. If you were so inclined.
Araj_MainDialog_68.context: NodeContext: Referring to her own neck.

Araj_MainDialog_41.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_41.text: Now, let me offer you a little treat. In exchange for the teensiest vial of your marvellous blood, I'll give you something that'll really throw your enemies for a loop.

Araj_MainDialog_59.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_59.text: I'll only ask a nominal fee in exchange.

Araj_MainDialog_159.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_159.text: You really are a fine collaborator.

Araj_MainDialog_40.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_40.text: Ah - I've already taken of you today; I'm afraid I can only use the first sample of the day. Nevertheless, if there's anything of mine that would be of use to you, do say so.

Araj_MainDialog_33.speaker: Player
Araj_MainDialog_33.text: You've had enough of my blood.

Araj_MainDialog_48.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_48.text: Now now, darling. Let's not be rude...

Araj_MainDialog_89.speaker: Astarion
Araj_MainDialog_89.text: They said 'no'. You should learn the meaning of the word.

Araj_MainDialog_105.speaker: Player
Araj_MainDialog_105.text: Why do you need more of my blood so badly?

Araj_MainDialog_34.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_34.text: My research will be quite worthless without proof. And my proof is running through your veins. I only need a tiny bit. Then - then my life will truly begin.

Araj_MainDialog_134.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_134.text: Ah. I'd so hoped it wouldn't come to this. But I can't let my prize experiment walk out that door. I'd hoped to take a sample with your permission. But I can do without it.

Araj_MainDialog_84.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_84.text: Hold on, my friend, hold on. I do need a sample of that blood before you go. My research will be worthless without it.
Araj_MainDialog_84.context: NodeContext: Growing agitated, might attack soon.

Araj_MainDialog_85.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_85.text: You say 'mad'. I say 'extraordinary'. We have that in common, my friend.

Araj_MainDialog_120.speaker: Player
Araj_MainDialog_120.text: My ancestors breathed fire - did you really think that would kill me?

Araj_MainDialog_182.speaker: Player
Araj_MainDialog_182.text: I am magic incarnate - it will take more than that to kill me.

Araj_MainDialog_183.speaker: Player
Araj_MainDialog_183.text: I should have known you would turn on me. We might have left the Underdark, but its treachery is never far behind.

Araj_MainDialog_124.speaker: Player
Araj_MainDialog_124.text: This is no poison I recognise. Talk - what did you do to me?

Araj_MainDialog_88.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_88.text: You're ready to try Formula Gruna, aren't you?

Araj_MainDialog_108.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_108.text: Ah, my friend. What can I do for you?

Araj_MainDialog_80.speaker: Player
Araj_MainDialog_80.text: Can I give you blood in exchange for some special items?

Araj_MainDialog_145.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_145.text: I'm afraid your blood is of little interest to me. But perhaps I can interest you in some other items.

Araj_MainDialog_136.speaker: Player
Araj_MainDialog_136.text: I'd like to see your wares.

Araj_MainDialog_114.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_114.text: Oh, darling. If you aren't tadpoled, we have nothing to discuss.

Araj_MainDialog_125.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_125.text: Ah, my friend. What can I do for you?

Araj_MainDialog_152.speaker: Player
Araj_MainDialog_152.text: Can I give you more blood in exchange for some special items?

Araj_MainDialog_165.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_165.text: Not today, I'm afraid. I need a nice and juicy sample - take too often, and you drain your specimen dry!

Araj_MainDialog_71.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_71.text: Still, I have other items that might interest you.

Araj_MainDialog_160.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_160.text: You heard me the first time, didn't you, darling? I'd like to speak to your tadpoled friend, if you don't mind.

Araj_MainDialog_169.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_169.text: Ah - a cosy little spot, isn't it? These four walls have witnessed greater alchemical triumphs than the keep of Urngath Dorrund!
Araj_MainDialog_169.context: NodeContext: You can pronounce the name phonetically/ as makes sense to you

Araj_MainDialog_87.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_87.text: And now that you're here, the crown jewel of my research is soon to be faceted. All you have to do is drink Formula Gruna.

Araj_MainDialog_38.speaker: Astarion
Araj_MainDialog_38.text: If that's her 'formula' I can smell, it's even fouler than her blood. Gods below...

Araj_MainDialog_193.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_193.text: Well yes. Formulae Arkku through Fruak were spectacular failures. But Gruna - Gruna is different. Believe me!

Araj_MainDialog_28.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_28.text: When you first entered this home, you saw the incredible latent power within your blood exposed in all its nuances. Formula Gruna will unleash that power within you.

Araj_MainDialog_55.speaker: Astarion
Araj_MainDialog_55.text: Say no - the only thing she's offering is pain and I don't want to see you hurt.

Araj_MainDialog_93.speaker: Karlach
Araj_MainDialog_93.text: I can probably handle a little fire, but I'm not sure about the rest of you.

Araj_MainDialog_29.speaker: Jaheira
Araj_MainDialog_29.text: Do you drink everything any petty mixer places in your hand? You must have a most colourful chamber pot.

Araj_MainDialog_42.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
Araj_MainDialog_42.text: I approve. Any who dare to make me bleed should suffer dire consequences.

Araj_MainDialog_97.speaker: Lae'zel
Araj_MainDialog_97.text: No, no, no. Does it really need to be said?

Araj_MainDialog_139.speaker: Wyll
Araj_MainDialog_139.text: I think a firm 'no thank you' is in order. Very firm.

Araj_MainDialog_157.speaker: Shadowheart
Araj_MainDialog_157.text: A potion that makes you explode? Seems a bit drastic.

Araj_MainDialog_164.speaker: Gale
Araj_MainDialog_164.text: One source of lethal explosive power in our party is quite enough. It seems ill-advised to add another.

Araj_MainDialog_177.speaker: Astarion
Araj_MainDialog_177.text: Do not trust anything this woman says. And certainly don't drink anything she offers you.

Araj_MainDialog_189.speaker: Minsc
Araj_MainDialog_189.context: NodeContext: Enthusiastically urging the player to drink a potion that makes their blood explode when exposed to air.

Araj_MainDialog_192.speaker: Halsin
Araj_MainDialog_192.text: A brew so potent, it makes you explode? Perhaps it has some use... though I struggle to see what.

Araj_MainDialog_181.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_181.text: Oh, marvellous. I've never been so excited for anything in all my days! Just - stand over there. Far over there. And drink up!

Araj_MainDialog_58.speaker: Astarion
Araj_MainDialog_58.text: What are you doing? That had better go down the drain and not down your gullet.
Araj_MainDialog_58.context: NodeContext: Player just accepted a disgusting/dangerous drink

Araj_MainDialog_83.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_83.text: Now, where the devil did that bottle go?! My silk! We can't continue without it!
Araj_MainDialog_83.context: NodeContext: 'My silk' as a stand in for 'my stars!' or 'my gods!'

Araj_MainDialog_186.speaker: Player
Araj_MainDialog_186.text: I won't be drinking any mysterious formulas today, thanks.

Araj_MainDialog_81.speaker: Araj Oblodra
Araj_MainDialog_81.text: Not even for the betterment of the alchemical arts the realm over? Not even for that?

Araj_MainDialog_92.speaker: Astarion
Araj_MainDialog_92.text: I trust you haven't forgotten what happened when I drank something she offered? This 'formula' won't be any kinder to you.

AD_BackupWarning_0.speaker: Araj Oblodra
AD_BackupWarning_0.text: You're are coming back, aren't you? Imminently?
AD_BackupWarning_0.context: NodeContext: A hint of a threat

AD_EvictedHouse_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_EvictedHouse_0.text: *Due to the presence of prohibited substances and apparatus, this house has been reclaimed, by order of Archduke Enver Gortash.*

AD_ArajBehaviour_1.speaker: Araj Oblodra
AD_ArajBehaviour_1.text: Least the ash can be repurposed. Some of it, at least.

AD_ArajBehaviour_2.speaker: Araj Oblodra
AD_ArajBehaviour_2.text: Imagine the look on Maldza's face...

AD_ArajBehaviour_4.speaker: Araj Oblodra
AD_ArajBehaviour_4.text: A little more work on my notes and House Oblodra will be restored!

AD_ArajBehaviour_5.speaker: Araj Oblodra
AD_ArajBehaviour_5.text: One step closer to the end of this project - ah, so very close!

PAD_ExplosivePotion_NonTadpoled_0.speaker: Player
PAD_ExplosivePotion_NonTadpoled_0.text: Ngh... a foul brew. My innards beg for mercy.
